articles.author: Jamie Dettmer, Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Zelenskyy digs in against calls to quit Bakhmut - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Holding Bakhmut made sense while Russia was suffering far higher casualties, but the logic of slogging it out is now in question.
